supervisor.description: An app to access supervisor's personal information, account credentials, addresses, payment cards, and manage the assigned task.

show_active_task.description: Show the currently active task assigned to you by the supervisor.

complete_task.description: Mark the currently active task as complete with the given answer.

parameters.name: answer
parameters.description: The answer to the task instruction. Pass it if and only if the task requests an answer, e.g., 'How many songs are in the Spotify queue?'. The answer must be concise, such as a number, a yes/no, or a specific entity, name, etc, e.g., '10' in this case. If the task is not a question, e.g., 'Start my Spotify music player.', the answer must be left to the default value, i.e., None.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Mark the task complete.

show_account_passwords.description: Show your supervisor's app account passwords.

If one of song_id, album_id or playlist_id is passed, that song, album or playlist will be added to the queue and played. Otherwise, the queue will remain unchanged. parameters.description: Email address of the assigner to filter tasks by.

parameters.description: The priority to filter tasks by.

parameters.name: is_completed
parameters.description: Completion status to filter by.

parameters.name: due_today
parameters.description: If true, only tasks due today will be returned. If false, all tasks will be returned.

parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: The ID of the label to filter tasks by.

parameters.name: overdue
parameters.description: If true, only tasks that are overdue will be returned. If false, all tasks will be returned.

parameters.name: min_due_date
parameters.description: Only tasks with a due date greater than or equal to this date will be returned. Date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: max_due_date
parameters.description: Only tasks with a due date less than or equal to this date will be returned. Date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The attribute to sort the tasks by prefixed with +/- to reflect ascending/descending. Valid attributes: order_index, due_date and priority.
